login_comment.en: Once logged in you can browse online catalogue, databases and submit comments on our web

maintenance_in_progress.en: You can't login at this time. Maintenance in progress.

mojeid_missing_header.en: Your library account is not connected with MojeID

mojeid_missing_link_text.en: Connect your library account with MojeID here

may_close_window.en: You may now close this window.

walkin_outside_library.en: Cannot use guest account outside the library

walkin_outside_please_return.en: Please return to the library network or log in using your library account.

walkin_logged_out.en: You have been logged out of the guest account because you are no longer inside the library network.
